text: Effective January 1st, 2024, all full-time employees are entitled to ten (10) paid sick days per calendar year. Unused days do not roll over. Vacation time starts accruing after 90 days of employment at a rate of 1.5 days per month.
The maximum allowable expense for a single business meal is $50 USD per person. All expense reports must be submitted within 30 days of the expense date using the designated internal system.
